title: poptimizer.data.app.viewers.NoDFError: ('quotes', 'POGR')
body:
Добрый день!
Возникает одна и та же  ошибка на 2 разных машинах.


  File "C:\Users\user\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python310\lib\runpy.py", line 196, in _run_module_as_main
    return _run_code(code, main_globals, None,

  File "C:\Users\user\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python310\lib\runpy.py", line 86, in _run_code
    exec(code, run_globals)

  File "C:\Users\user\poptimizer\poptimizer\__main__.py", line 48, in <module>
    app(prog_name="poptimizer")

  File "C:\Users\user\poptimizer\poptimizer\__main__.py", line 17, in evolve
    ev.evolve()

  File "C:\Users\user\poptimizer\poptimizer\evolve\evolve.py", line 41, in evolve
    step = self._step_setup(step)

  File "C:\Users\user\poptimizer\poptimizer\evolve\evolve.py", line 62, in _step_setup
    self._end = d_max or listing.all_history_date(self._tickers)[-1]

  File "C:\Users\user\poptimizer\poptimizer\data\views\listing.py", line 28, in all_history_date
    return quotes.all_prices(tickers).loc[start:end].index

  File "C:\Users\user\poptimizer\poptimizer\data\views\quotes.py", line 40, in all_prices
    quotes_list = not_div.quotes(tickers)

  File "C:\Users\user\poptimizer\poptimizer\data\views\crop\not_div.py", line 35, in quotes
    dfs = viewer.get_dfs(ports.QUOTES, tickers)

  File "C:\Users\user\poptimizer\poptimizer\data\app\viewers.py", line 39, in get_dfs
    return self._loop.run_until_complete(asyncio.gather(*tasks))

  File "C:\Users\user\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python310\lib\asyncio\base_events.py", line 646, in run_until_complete
    return future.result()

  File "C:\Users\user\poptimizer\poptimizer\data\app\viewers.py", line 51, in _query
    raise NoDFError(group, name)

poptimizer.data.app.viewers.NoDFError: ('quotes', 'POGR')
